task.summary: Created a new branch for baseline_test_01
Created a new branch for baseline_test_01 Updated django project description from Credit Management System to LOan Management System.
Listed the different modules of the project: Membership, Accounting, Transaction, System Setting and Report
[3] onad | 20200325 | Improvement of [2] / Loading of bootstrap4 into the system (as static file/s) / Update base.html and other templates to suit screens draft / 1st draft of base pages

[3] onad | 20200325 | Improvement of [2]
bootstrap4 files copied to djproj202001\static\css and djproj202001\static\js run this to add the statis files in the djproj202001\static\ --> djproj202001\assets\ >python manage.py collectstatic
CEUCCI Base Template: Header and Sticky Footer: base_bootstrap_hdr_stky-ftr.html/sticky-footer-navbar.css

djproj202001/views.py --------------------- from django.shortcuts import render, redirect #[4] from django.contrib.auth.forms import UserCreationForm #[4] ... def signup(request): #[4] title = 'CEU CC Management System User Registration' if request.method == 'POST': form = UserCreationForm(request.POST) if form.is_valid(): form.save() return redirect('site_home') else: form = UserCreationForm()
return render(request, 'registration/signup.html', {'title': title, 'form': form})
djproj202001/urls.py -------------------- urlpatterns = [ ... path('signup/', views.signup, name='signup'), #[4] ... ]
templates/registration/signup.html ----------------------------------
